"A.P.241/3/22/12:00": "Bienvenid@ de vuelta! How was it? Did you get the hang of using it?"
"Well, if there's anything that you want to know about, I'm more than willing to listen and give you a hand!"
"All part of the job description for <%me>'s personal operator, Xiera!"
"Let's continue from where we left off. The ARKS headquarters have an important request. Please listen closely:"
"<%me>! It's been a while! It's Ulc,\u3000do you remember me? A lot has happened and I became a commander."
"I heard that your memories are a bit foggy, so I really wanted to see you in person. But Xiao's got a lot on his hands, so we're both REAL busy!"
"Sorry that I can only send you a voice message. Next time, I'll make sure to meet up with you!"
"Putting that aside, I have a request that I want ask you to do."
"There have been an unusual cases of never-before-seen seemingly ARKS members appearing recently."
"I've been looking in the information sectors, but I think that Casra is hiding something since he didn't report any findings."
"So in other words, I want you to investigate."
"In order to gather more intel on them, I'll need you to tag along with one of said members and keep an eye on them."
"I'm sorry, but since Casra won't say anything I had to ask you instead. If you're able to do this, I'm counting on you!"
"And that's the end of Commander Ulc's message."
"I see, so that was the reason why <%me> was contacted. I agree with her."
"Ulc took over the position as Commander from Xiao, because everything's in a mess. I also think that she's asking me as well."
"Well then, let's prepare to depart. Please come to me when you're ready."
"Oh also, ARKS' organization went through a bit of a restructure."
"If you're interested about it, please come and listen anytime."
